relevant_findings.general: No acute distress, alert and oriented x3.
relevant_findings.abdominal: Soft, non-distended, tender to palpation in RUQ, positive Murphy's sign.

relevant_findings.liver: Hepatic parenchyma within normal limits, smooth contour, calcified granuloma in the left lobe (0.8 cm), several simple cysts.
relevant_findings.bile_ducts: No intrahepatic biliary dilation, CBD measures 6 mm.
relevant_findings.gallbladder: Distended gallbladder with sludge and stones at the neck, mild wall thickening and edema, positive sonographic Murphy's sign.
relevant_findings.kidneys: Normal limited images of right kidney, no hydronephrosis.
